attributes.action: Provide better services for mentally ill teenagers
attributes.additional_details:
From a personal experience I can say that the services the NHS provide for young people suffering mental health issues isn't good enough.

Too many people fall through the net, and unfortunately, they lose their lives.

I want something to be done right here, right now, I want other people to stay with us and with the right level of support they will.

Please help me in my case, it would really mean so so much!
